title: Manage LNG Carrier Berthing
description: A port operator coordinates the safe berthing of a large LNG (Liquefied Natural Gas) carrier at the import terminal.

tasks.description: Confirm the LNG carrier's ETA and schedule the required resources, including pilots and tugboats.
tasks.expected_outcome: All necessary support vessels and personnel are scheduled for the ship's arrival.

tasks.description: Verify that the terminal's safety and security exclusion zones are established prior to the vessel's arrival.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system confirms that all safety protocols for LNG ship arrival are active.

tasks.description: Monitor the berthing operation in real-time, tracking the vessel's approach speed and position relative to the jetty.
tasks.expected_outcome: The vessel is monitored and berths safely without incident.
